pullRequest.title: Fixed problem with leap year
pullRequest.bodyText:
the exception is no longer thrown if expiration date is set to 29. 2. of a leap year
if extension of membership is set to 29. 2. of a non-leap year, it's set to 28. 2. instead

nodes.bodyText: Please add an information that year 1972 has been chosen just because it is a leap year. And maybe the year 2000 is easier for everybody to know that can be divided by 4.

commit.message:
Fixed problem with leap year

- the exception is no longer thrown if expiration date is set to 29. 2. of a leap year
- if extension of membership is set to 29. 2. of a non-leap year, it's set to 28. 2. instead
